logic

Class Battle

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Battle

  • public final class Battle
extends Object
    A battle can occur between two different actors. In case the other one is not player controlled, its actions are taken by java.util.Random instead.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Battle(Actor attacker, Actor defender, IUpdate gui)
      Creates a new battle.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Actor getAttacker()
      Get the attacker of the battle.
      Actor getCurrent()
      Get the actor whose turn it is.
      Actor getDefender()
      Get the defender of the battle.
      boolean takeAction(BattleAction act)
      Makes the actor to perform the selected BattleAction.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Battle

        public Battle(Actor attacker,
      Actor defender,
      IUpdate gui)
        Creates a new battle.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The attacker of the battle
        defender - The defender of the battle
        gui - The gui that is updated after every performed BattleAction.

    • Method Detail

      • takeAction

        public boolean takeAction(BattleAction act)
        Makes the actor to perform the selected BattleAction. Also switches the turn.
        Parameters:
        act - The action to perform.
        Returns:
        Whether the battle is aborted.

      • getDefender

        public Actor getDefender()
        Get the defender of the battle.
        Returns:
        The defending actor of the battle.

      • getAttacker

        public Actor getAttacker()
        Get the attacker of the battle.
        Returns:
        The attacking actor of the battle.

      • getCurrent

        public Actor getCurrent()
        Get the actor whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        The current actor.
